encapsulated custom elements by using Angular 6 Implemented databinding and MVC using Angular 4 for front end development of a current web application Worked with Http Interceptors configurations for HTML5 PHP CSS3 JavaScript jQuery Bootstrap Ability to understand wireframes UX flows and mockups and use SCSS stylings for making the application more optimized and trendier Implemented CORS crossorigin resource sharing allowing the request through different hosts and JSON formatters for sending data in camelCase Experience in coding accessible website following the WCAG 20 AA standard
